import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import {FontAwesomeIcon} from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import {faCalendar, faCirclePlus,faMagnifyingGlass} from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import Filter from "./filter"; import {useEffect, useState} from "react"; function HomePage() { const [data1, setData] = useState([]) const fetchData= async () =>{ try{ const response= await fetch('http://localhost:8000/data1') const json= await response.json() console.log("data1",data1) setData(json) }catch (err) { console.log(err) } } const handleFilterValue = (value) => { console.log('Filter value:', value); }; useEffect(()=>{ fetchData() },[]) return ( <>

ETKİNLİKLER

Tüm Etkinlikler Tiyatro Konser Stand Up Sinema Çocuk

Takvimde Gör

{data1?.map((x)=>

{x.date}

{x.type}

{x.location}

{x.text}

Takvime ekle

)}
) } export default HomePage
